HomePage.about_me_resume: I am a Front-end Developer focused on building modern, high-performance, and accessible interfaces using the React and Next.js stack.

about_me.title_1: Hello! I am a front-end developer with over 4 years of experience, specializing in transforming complex ideas into high-performance web applications. My focus is to ensure that each interface is intuitive, accessible, and capable of scaling as your business grows.
about_me.title_2: Coming from a solid background in QA, I bring a critical eye to code quality and meticulous attention to detail. I work primarily with the React, Next.js, and TypeScript ecosystem, ensuring that each solution is robust, tested, and ready for market.

communication.title: Effective Communication
communication.description: Ability to translate technical requirements and collaborate with designers.

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving
problemSolving.description: Analytical thinking focused on finding performative and scalable solutions.

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Ease in learning new stacks and adapting to scope changes.

ProjectsPage.my_projects_description: A collection of recent work that demonstrates my passion for design and high-quality code.

projects.finance_ai_description: A financial management system that uses AI to generate insights and tips to improve your financial life.
projects.notes_description: A notepad featuring voice command functionality to type your notes.
projects.hamburgueria_description: Burger restaurant application using Vanilla JavaScript.

ContactPage.title: Let's work together?
ContactPage.description: I'm always looking for new challenges. If you have a project in mind or just want to say hi, get in touch.

form.description: Fill in the details below to be assisted by our team via WhatsApp.

form.whatsapp_greeting: Hello! I came from the website and would like assistance.
